channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Information Queue
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Verify Information Queue

item.title: CVE-2022-35284|2024-09-16T16:33:29.674Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20information%20queue
item.description: IBM Security Verify Information Queue 10.0.2 could disclose sensitive information due to a missing or insecure SameSite attribute for a sensitive cookie. IBM X-Force ID: 230811.

item.title: CVE-2021-20402|2024-09-16T16:42:40.725Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20information%20queue
item.description: IBM Security Verify Information Queue 1.0.6 and 1.0.7 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 196076.

item.title: CVE-2021-20404|2024-09-16T16:33:18.800Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20information%20queue
item.description: IBM Security Verify Information Queue 1.0.6 and 1.0.7 could allow a user on the network to cause a denial of service due to an invalid cookie value that could prevent future logins. IBM X-Force ID: 196078.

item.title: CVE-2022-35285|2024-09-16T16:52:51.056Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20information%20queue
item.description: IBM Security Verify Information Queue 10.0.2 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 230812.
